1.command: Update to V16.41 or later version
1.description: Update the firmware CPC80 to V16.41 or later version. The firmware CPC80 V16.41 is present within 'CP-8000/CP-8021/CP-8022 Package' V16.41. URL: https://support.industry.siemens.com/cs/ww/en/view/109812178/

2.command: Update to V5.30 or later version
2.description: Update the firmware CPCI85 to V5.30 or later version. The firmware CPCI85 V5.30 is present within 'CP-8031/CP-8050 Package' V5.30. URL: https://support.industry.siemens.com/cs/ww/en/view/109804985/

3.command: Update to V5.30 or later version
3.description: Update the firmware OPUPI0 to V5.30 or later version. The firmware OPUPI0 V5.30 is present within 'CP-8031/CP-8050 Package' V5.30. URL: https://support.industry.siemens.com/cs/ww/en/view/109804985/

4.command: Update to V1.3.0 or later version
4.description: Update the firmware SICORE to V1.3.0 or later version. The firmware SICORE V1.3.0 is present within 'SICAM 8 Software Solution Package' V5.30. URL: https://support.industry.siemens.com/cs/ww/en/view/109818240/
